title: Suzanne Somers' husband to release AI clone of late actress
description: Alan Hamel, who married the "Three's Company" star in 1977, revealed that he's forging ahead with plans to create an artificial intelligence version of his late wife.
content:
Two years after Suzanne Somers died following a decades-long battle with breast cancer, her widower is preparing to publicly release of a clone of the beloved “Three’s Company” star.

title: Hack Yourself: How To Find Uses For AI In Everything You Do At Work
description: To use artificial intelligence at work, think about the things you can stop doing, the things you can do better and the new things you can do.
content:
Imagine the future of your job. Now imagine how, enabled by generative artificial intelligence, you can destroy it.

title: Florida law targets using AI to ‘nudify’ people’s photos
description: A sweeping new Florida law that took effect Oct. 1 makes it illegal to produce sexual images of a person using artificial intelligence or similar technologies without their permission.
content:
A sweeping new Florida law that took effect Oct. 1 makes it illegal to produce sexual images of a person using artificial intelligence or similar technologies without their permission.

title: AI not a reliable source of news, EU media study says
description: Paris, France—Artificial intelligence assistants such as ChatGPT made errors about half the time when asked about news events, according to a vast
content:
Paris, France—Artificial intelligence assistants such as ChatGPT made errors about half the time when asked about news events, according to a vast study by European public broadcasters released Wednesday.

title: Artificial Intelligence: Revolutionizing Every Aspect of Life - AI Assistants Mislead in Almost Half of News Responses: EBU-BBC Study
description: Artificial Intelligence (AI) is rapidly redefining the way we live, work, and interact.
